-- input.json --
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "import": "myapp.com/web",
      "type": "*Web"
    }
  ],
  "externals": [
  ],
  "target": "myapp.com/gen/web"
}

-- expect.txt --
&web.Web{w: &web.Web{
  bud: true,
}}

-- main.go --
package main

import (
  "os"
  "fmt"
  "github.com/hexops/valast"
  genweb "myapp.com/gen/web"
)

func main() {
  actual := genweb.Load()
  fmt.Fprintf(os.Stdout, "%s\n", valast.String(actual))
}

-- go.mod --
module myapp.com

require (
  github.com/hexops/valast v1.4.1
)

-- bud/web/web.go --
package web

// New web
func New() *Web {
  return &Web{true}
}

// Web struct
type Web struct {
  bud bool
}

-- web/web.go --
package web

import (
  "myapp.com/bud/web"
)

// New web
func New(w *web.Web) *Web {
  return &Web{w}
}

// Web struct
type Web struct {
  w *web.Web
}
